title: Harris and Walz hold first rally together as new Democratic ticket
content: At a raucous event in Pennsylvania, the pair attack their Republican opponents and vow to win the crucial swing state.
summary: At a raucous event in Pennsylvania, the pair attack their Republican opponents and vow to win the crucial swing state.

title: With jokes and jibes, Tim Walz takes national stage
content: His style may prove more effective at convincing undecided voters than the dark rhetoric of the Biden campaign, writes Anthony Zurcher.
summary: His style may prove more effective at convincing undecided voters than the dark rhetoric of the Biden campaign, writes Anthony Zurcher.

title: Hamas names Yahya Sinwar as new overall leader
content: Hamas has named Yahya Sinwar as its new political chief, replacing Ismail Haniyeh who was killed last week.
